metadata.title: CVE-2018-5710 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in MIT Kerberos 5 (aka krb5) through 1.16. Thepre-defined function "strlen" is getting a "NULL" string as a parametervalue in plugins/kdb/ldap/libkdb_ldap/ldap_principal2.c in the KeyDistribution Center (KDC), which allows remote authenticated users to causea denial of service (NULL pointer dereference) via a modified kadminclient.

criterions.comment: krb5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
